lines.text: Operator. May I help you?
Operator, I've been trying to get 555-8129. 212? The recording says its been disconnected.
Just a moment please.
[pause]
I'm sorry, the number's been changed to an unlisted number.
Operator, this is a real emergency please. You need to give me that number.
I'm sorry. We're not allowed to give out that information.
Well *fuck you*!
My place or yours?
[Alex slams phone]

[to Dan]
Well, what am I supposed to do? You won't answer my calls, you change your number. I mean, I'm not gonna be ignored, Dan!
You're so sad. You know that, Alex? Lonely and very sad.
Don't you ever pity me, you smug bastard.
I'll pity you... I'll pity you. I'll pity you because you're sick.
Why? Because I won't allow you treat me like some slut you can just bang a couple of times and throw in the garbage?

[on the phone to Dan]
Bring the dog, I love animals... I'm a great cook.

[on the phone to Alex]
If you ever come near my family again, I'll kill you. Do you understand?

[to Dan]
We were attracted to each other at the party, that was obvious! You're on your own for the night, that's also obvious... we're two adults.

[to Alex]
This has got to stop.

[to Jimmy]
She keeps calling the apartment. Every time Beth answers the phone, she hangs up. I'm scared Jimmy, and I don't want to lose my family.
Shit, shit, shit!

[repeating Beth]
Shit, shit, shit! Shit, shit, shit!
You must have to be discreet.
Oh, god yeah.
Are you?
Am I what?
Discreet?
Yes, I'm discreet.
Me, too.
I had a wonderful time last night. I'd like to see you again. Is that so terrible?
No. I just don't think it's possible.

[to Dan, about Alex]
Did you have an affair with her?
Whatever resentment she's feeling, she probably got it out of her system.
What if she didn't get it out of her system? What then?

[to Dan]
I guess you thought you'd get away with it. Well, you can't.
Why are you trying to hurt me?
I'm not trying to hurt you Dan, I love you!
You what?
I love you!
You don't even know me
How can you say that?
Do you remember the girl, who came to the apartment?
The one with the blond hair.
You're here with a strange girl being a naughty boy.
I don't think having dinner with anybody's a crime.

[to Dan]
You play fair with me, I'll play fair with you.

[to Beth]
And don't you think I understand what you're doing? You're trying to move him into the country... and you're keeping him away from me. And you're playing happy family. Aren't you?
[begins to slice her own leg with a butcher knife]

You wouldn't understand that because you're so... so selfish. He told me about you. He told me about you. He was very honest. If you weren't so stupid, you'd know that. But you're so stupid. You're so stupid... you're a stupid, selfish bitch!
Have you ever done it in an elevator?
Not recently, no.
I bet you haven't.
[last lines]
Dan! Dan!

[to Dan]
Where's your wife?

[to Dan]
This is not gonna stop. It keeps going on and on.
Alicia, where's Ellen?
She's gone.
Look, Alex... I like you. And maybe if I wasn't with somebody else, I'd be with you. But I am.
Please don't justify yourself, it's pathetic. You'd tell me to fuck off, I'd have more respect for you.
All right, then fuck off.

[from her tape, which Dan is listening to]
Hello, Dan. Are you surprised? This is what you force me to do. I guess you thought you'd get away with it. Well... you can't. 'Cause part of you is growing inside of me, and that's a fact, Dan. You'd better start... Learning how to deal with it. Just so you know... I feel you. I taste you. I think you. I touch you. Can you understand? Can you? I'm just... asking you... to acknowledge your responsibilities. I... Is that so bad? I-I don't think so. I don't think it's unreasonable. And... you know, annother thing... And it's that you thought you could just walk into my life, and turn it upside down, without a thought for anyone but yourself. You know what you are, Dan? You are a cocksucking son of a bitch. I hate you. I bet you don't even like real girls, do you? Ha! You disappoint me, you fucking faggot!
[first lines]

[to Dan]
You better get going kiddo, we're gonna be late.
